props.name: title
props.description: Text to use within the panel title. If content is provided in the `title` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: text
props.description: Text to use within the panel content. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

slots.name: title
slots.description: The content of the panel title. If content is provided in this slot, the `title` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the panel. If content is provided in this slot, the `text` prop will be ignored.
